name: Taking Care
description:
Move the little humans to prevent them from spreading the virus, but beware with extreme isolation.

WARNING: We recommend playing the downloadable windows version if possible, the browser version seems to not be working as intended.

How to play:

The little humans have a mental health bar, that can shrink over time.

   

If that bar reaches 0, the person feels isolation, and starts loosing health.


If the little human socializes by getting close to others though, it regains any lost mental health. But careful! If they get to close, they could get infected, which in turn makes them loose health over time and propagate de virus further.

Make sure to keep the balance in this hectic and chaotic experience! If you manage to keep enough people alive until the swabbing test comes around, and then stabilize their health and mental health accordingly, you win!

Controls: Click and drag left click of the mouse. Hover over the little humans to see relevant information.
